name: Smile (itch)
description:
Controls

A & D - Movement
E - Select

Try to keep your guy or girl's needs in order over the course of the day. Letting your needs get too low will cause others to drain quicker so watch out!
If you go 4 hours with emtpy bars you'll get a game over

Made this for Ruinjam over the last 2 weeks and had a lot of fun making a cute little thing. :3

Just Smile!
